title: Rover and Dave 2 combined profits in new Nash

content.question: The advertising agency raises its prices, causing a firm that chooses to run ads to earn $200 less in profits. Once the firms adjust to the higher advertising prices, what is the total combined profit of the two firms in the new Nash equilibrium?

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
